projects.title: E-Commerce App (React)
projects.description: A front-end electronics store built with React. Portfolio project based on the “Shopping Cart” assignment from The Odin Project.

projects.title: Odin Todo
projects.description: A functional Todo List application built as part of The Odin Project curriculum.

projects.title: Odin Weather
projects.description: A simple JavaScript weather application that fetches real-time weather data for any city using the Visual Crossing weather API (https://www.visualcrossing.com/weather-api/).

projects.title: Memory Card Game
projects.description: A Pokémon-themed memory card game built with React. Test your memory by selecting each Pokémon only once.
